tasks.text:
## Markers
Allow placing arbitrary markers anywhere in the display

## Coordinate Axis
Add a coordinate axis in which the candles are drawn in and a crosshair which takes information from those.

## File Handling
* Be able to generate Candle positions, heights and signs from ...
* Drag'n'Drop csv files

## Initial Setup
Create GraphicsEngine class

Get a window with debug background  color to appear

Create a more sophisticated base object that handles VAO, VBO shader program generation and so.

Don't use the broad class structure of the tutorial on the 3D engine, instead make a simplest viable product that goes beyond the boilerplate heavy approach of the snake game.

Implement Background as an inheritor of an abstract QUAD class.

## Candles

Be able to draw Candles as Quads

Scale and position them arbitrarily (for now in NDC)

Allow passing color to them coloring them green or red.

## Interactivity
Moving the screen when holding right mouse button (panning).
